name: 7th Global Summit on Waste Management and Recycling
content: The 7th edition of the Waste Management & Recycling conference will be organized in New York, the USA is to be held on 29-30, 2021\. Waste Management 2021, aims to gather the most elegant societies and industries along with renowned and honorable persons form top universities across the globe. Waste Management 2021, on behalf of its organizing Committee, welcomes all the Recycling researchers, industrialists, young scientists as well as student and corporate delegates to participate and to have a great experience.
